snippet.title: Magicka - Get Your Robes Ready! Teaser
snippet.description:
Join us on facebook: http://www.facebook.com/MagickaGame
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Magickagame
Join us on the forum: http://forum.paradoxplaza.com
Unlock some of the magic: http://www.magickagame.com
Get Your Robes Ready! It's Beta Time for Magicka
Limited amounts of seats offered to wise & whacky wizards

 By proclamation from the wizards of Paradox Interactive and Arrowhead Games has issued an exclusive invitation to join the limited Closed Beta for  Magicka. See for yourself the extraordinary wonders in the the quite frankly awesome upcoming fantasy adventure game!Based on Norse mythology and packed with magical spells, Magicka is scheduled for release in Q1, 2011.
Are you ready to join the mythological world of Magicka?  

Sign-Up for a Coveted Spot in the Closed Beta Now!

How do you apply for beta access?
1: Snap a photo of yourself in a Magicka Robe (bath robe, smoking robe, house robe, Snuggie- whatever works!)
2: "Like" the Magicka fan page on Facebook -  www.facebook.com/magickagame 
3: Post the photo on the Facebook page wall. Don't be shy.

When you have posted a Robe-image, 
you have a chance to get a place in the limited closed beta.

If you are one of the winning wizards selected for a place in the Closed Beta,
you will receive a confirmation within 2-3 weeks.

You might have thought heroes in fantasy games are all knights and warriors, ey? In fact the best ones  are wise and whacky wizards. That will torch you with a large amount of friendly fire in multiplayer.  Bear witness to the many regal aspects of gameplay in Magicka. Save the world from doom as a co-op effort of four or single handedly using a fully dynamic spell system. Prepare to defeat the evil wizard as you wreak havoc and devastation on the minions of darkness. Experience a world of grand fantasy like never before!
